meanings.definition: The quality or state of being curmudgeonly.
meanings.sent1: His curmudgeonliness was evident in the way he grumbled about everything.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but chuckle at the curmudgeonliness of her neighbor's complaints.
meanings.sent3: Despite his curmudgeonliness, he always had a soft spot for stray animals.
meanings.sent4: The curmudgeonliness of the old man's demeanor melted away when he saw his granddaughter.
meanings.sent5: The curmudgeonliness of the boss made the office atmosphere tense and gloomy.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a curmudgeon.
meanings.sent1: The curmudgeonliness of his refusal to try new things frustrated his friends.
meanings.sent2: Her curmudgeonliness was especially evident when it came to technology.
meanings.sent3: Despite her curmudgeonliness, she always had a twinkle in her eye when telling stories.
meanings.sent4: The curmudgeonliness of his stubbornness was like a brick wall in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The curmudgeonliness of the customer made the waiter's job particularly challenging.
